column3: Latest;Phnom Penh:------ On the morning of March 26
column6: police detained and arrested four people out of fifteen wanted
column7: including a top ranking police officer involved with the Rock Entertainment Center drug raid.------The arrested officer was named as Leng Sok Kong
column8: head of Anti-Narcotics Intervention Office of the Phnom Penh Police Commissariat.------Nearly 50 kilograms of drugs were found in the club on February 23
column10: oknha Kith Thieng remains in PJ prison awaiting trial.
